desc: Scrubby buddy contains simple elements to nurture your home biome: clean home+clean world. A zero-waster alternative to Comet cleaner, Ajax cleanser, and Mrs. Meyer's Surface Scrub: Scrubby Buddy scouring ingredients: calcium carbonate, citric acid, sodium percarbonate, and sea salt.

layout.text:
Our household cleaning powder
in planet-only packaging—
Zero Waste Now!
